title: Yaar intha penthan lyrics - Boss Engira Baskaran song lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Haricharan
Song: Yaar Intha Penthan
Movie: Boss Engira Baskaran
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Yaar intha penthan endru ketten munnale
Ival endhan paadhi endru kandaen thannale
Ennai parkiraal edho ketkiral engum irukiralo
Kannal sirikiral munnal nadakiral nenjai kizhikiralo
Kootathil irundhum thaniyaga therindhaal
Thotathil malarndha poovaga thirindhal
Ennai yedho seidhaal...

Yaar intha penthan endru ketten munnale
Ival endhan paadhi endru kandaen thannale

En veetu muttrathil ival podum kolangal
eppodhum vandum endru kettaen
Anil aadum koodathil ival paadum ragathil
adhikalai suriyanai parthaen
Kannadi vazhalayai pole
kaiyodu Naanum pirakkave thodipen
Kaltheendum kozhusil ennoda manasa
Serthu korkave thavippen
kadhodu thavalum kammal polkidapen
Kannathai urasi en jenmam mudipen
ennai yedho seidhaal...

Yaar intha penthan endru ketten munnale
Ival endhan paadhi endru kandaen thannale...

Nan konjam parthaal enjaeyo parpal
parkadha neram ennai parpal
Ennai parthu siripal nan parthal maraipal
meyaaga poiyagathaan nadipaal
Pen nenjam pudhi adhai eppodum
yaarum yaarum arindhadhey illai
Aan nenjin thudipum andrada thavipum
pengal madhipadhey illai
Manam nondha piragae mudhal varthai solval
Mazhai nindra kudai thandhu selval
Ennai yedho seidhaal...

Yaar intha penthan endru ketten munnale
Ival endhan paadhi endru kandaen thannale ...
